recipes.name: Classic French Toast
recipes.description: Golden brown French toast with a hint of cinnamon, perfect for a cozy breakfast.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Dip bread slices into the mixture, coating both sides evenly.
Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Cook each slice for 2–3 minutes on each side until golden brown.
Serve warm with maple syrup.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Tacos
recipes.description: Flavorful vegetarian tacos loaded with beans, veggies, and fresh toppings.
instructions: Heat a skillet over medium heat and sauté bell pepper and onion for 3–4 minutes.
Add black beans and corn, season with salt and pepper, and heat through.
Warm the tortillas in a separate pan or microwave.
Spoon the veggie mixture onto each tortilla.
Top with avocado slices, coriander, and a squeeze of lime.

recipes.name: Chocolate Mug Cake
recipes.description: A quick single-serving chocolate cake made in the microwave—perfect for dessert cravings.
instructions: In a microwave-safe mug, mix all dry ingredients.
Add milk, oil, and vanilla extract and stir until smooth.
Microwave on high for 1 minute to 1 minute 20 seconds.
Let it cool slightly before eating.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Juicy shrimp tossed in garlic butter and served over spaghetti for a quick yet elegant dinner.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté garlic and chili flakes for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook for 2–3 minutes per side until pink and opaque.
Add cooked pasta, lemon juice, zest, and toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper and garnish with parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Mango Lassi
recipes.description: A creamy, sweet Indian yogurt drink with fresh mango and a hint of cardamom.
instructions: Combine mango, yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom in a blender.
Blend until smooth and frothy.
Serve chilled over ice if desired.

recipes.name: Baked Sweet Potato Fries
recipes.description: Crispy oven-baked sweet potato fries seasoned to perfection—healthy and delicious!
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into fries
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F) and line a baking tray with parchment paper.
Toss sweet potato fries in olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Spread out on the tray in a single layer.
Bake for 25–30 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden and crispy.
Serve hot with your favorite dip.
